mean_cn: v. 提升；促进；发扬；促销
mean_en: to change the rank or position of (someone) to a higher or more important one
word_etyma: pro向前，在前+mot动+e→向前动→促进
short_phrase: promote her to a higher position
sentence: She was very good at her job, so her boss promoted her to a higher position.
sentence_trans: 她工作表现很棒，所以她的老板把她升到了更高的位置。
